chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> DTA_ref_ok (dta_kill_non_coacc d)

Premises:
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
dta_kill_non_coacc = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => dta (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a end : DTA -> DTA
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
dta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta_kill_non_coacc d) sigma
predta_kill_non_coacc_semantics : forall (d : DTA) (t : term), DTA_ref_ok d -> reconnait d t < -> reconnait (dta_kill_non_coacc d) t
dta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d
dta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true
dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy_correct_wrt_sign : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy d) sigma
predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy_semantics : forall (d : DTA) (t : term), DTA_ref_ok d -> reconnait d t < -> reconnait (dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy d) t
DTA_main_state_correct_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct d -> DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true
DTA_main_state_correct_check_complete : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true -> DTA_main_state_correct d
kill_non_coacc_lazy_eq_kill_non_coacc : forall d : DTA, dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy d = dta_kill_non_coacc d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
predta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_ref_ok_check d = true
predta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check d = true -> preDTA_ref_ok d
predta_kill_non_coacc_dir : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (non_coacc_kill d (predta_coacc_states d a)) a t
predta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (sigma : signature), preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (predta_kill_non_coacc d a) sigma
predta_coacc_states = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
predta_coacc_states_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
pl_tl_length_rec_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
dta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_compat_check d sigma = true
predta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_compat_check d sigma = true -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
predta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_compat_check d sigma = true
dta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
dta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : DTA, dta_compatible d0 d1 -> DTA_compat d0 d1
pl_tl_length_rec_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d ls (tcons hd tl) -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
predta_ref_ok_check = fun d : preDTA => predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d : preDTA -> bool

```coq
Theorem dta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta_kill_non_coacc d) sigma.
Proof.
  intros d sigma HrefOk Hcorrect.
  unfold dta_kill_non_coacc.
  destruct d as [p a].
  apply dta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign in Hcorrect.
  apply predta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign in Hcorrect.
  auto.
Qed.
